modName: Dawnguard Rune Axe Script Crash Fix
summary: Fixes the frequently caused crashes from the Script attached to the Dawnguard Rune Axe (DLC1DawnguardRuneAxeScript.psc).
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][b][size=3]Description:[/size]

[/b]This mod completely removes the enchantment from the Dawnguard Rune Axe weapon from the Dawnguard DLC. This prevents Skyrim from crashing due to the damn persistent script (DLC1DawnguardRuneAxeScript.psc) from [font=Tahoma]Dawnguard.esm[/font].

I've realized that if you're far enough in the game, you probably don't care if the axe stores the amount of undead you kill with it lol (also sun damage is pretty useless anyways).

[u]If you want the sun damage enchantment theme to still be present, I've included a second file option so the axe uses the same enchantment as Auriel's Bow[/u].

[b][size=3]
Requirements[/size]

[/b]- Skyrim.esm
- Dawnguard.esm
- a burning desire to play skyrim with less CTDs <3


Leave concerns or problems in the 'posts' section if there are any!! [font=Tahoma] (or good things too lol)[/font]


[/font]
[b]
[/b]
author: Trothminbonboicksenfavette
